ModMetaData.name: Jayne's Cunning Hat
ModMetaData.author: Darren McDonald
ModMetaData.description:
Man walks down the street in that hat, people know he's not afraid of anything...
Jayne's Cunning Hat is an additional hat for Rimworld based off of a hat worn by Jayne Cobb from the TV show Firefly. It provides a bonus to shooting and a penalty to social skills. Jayne's hat can't be made, but can often be found on Mercs missing their mamas.
Github: https://github.com/CompiledMayhem/JaynesCunningHat
